summary:
I'm an Art director,Graphic designer and Photographer who lives in Holland.

With 15 years experience in Japanese advertising industry
I'm experienced in working on many big projects together with the largest advertising agency team.

【Specialties】
-Concept decision
-Advertisement strategy
-Art direction 
-Photo retouching
-Make a submission data

-Advertising
-Logo design
-Editorial design
-CD cover
-Stage design
-Application UI
-Web design
etc...

【Strengths】
-Good work ethos.
-Open to solve customer problems.
- Active participation in brainstorming sessions.
- Ensure optimum presentation of the design to the customer, complete with a clear story and accountability.
-Linking Japanese culture and experience with other countries.

I do everything with the utmost customer care.
Because that's the Japanese way.
Japanese design and photo materials are very much in demand.


【New project for Japanese Kimono】
My present project is to sell kimono design patterns as high resolution design digital data.
I collaborate with Japanese traditional dyeing masters who make a hand painted Kimono looking like a work of art.

I'm going to introduce and sell these designs to the European interior decorator's industry.
When traditional culture and foreign culture meet  innovation is well possible.

It is my hope to help Japanese craftsmen and protect their traditional culture.
Please see
http://bit.ly/hana_mi

treasury_media.title: Logo design
treasury_media.description:
Create a concept strategy and unique design to enhance branding.
I emphasize information gathering and brainstorming.

treasury_media.title: Advertisement design
treasury_media.description:
To work as a graphic designer in projects member which from the largest advertising agency team in Japan.
It was a valuable opportunity to learn about marketing and advertising strategies.

treasury_media.title: Photography and design for Charity Calendar.
treasury_media.description:
Relation ship with ASSOCIATION "échanges toubab"​ which is helping Senegalese elementary school.
I did a mural painting workshop, photographed, and used the picture to created a charity calendar.

treasury_media.title: 【Project  Link】Japanese Kimono design for Europe.
treasury_media.description:
【Please jump to this site】 http://bit.ly/hana_mi
Propose traditional Japanese designs s high resolution printing data which is from Kimono "Yuzen". It is a new project that teamed up with Japanese traditional craftsmans for save and raise the culture.

profile_positions.description:
Advertising design studio in Tokyo.
Team up with the biggest advertising agency which are “Dentsu” and "Hakuhodo”.

I also had some big projects in advertising for 
-TOYOTA
-NISSAN
-McDonald's
-Mobile companies
-GODIVA
-Jewelry Brands
-Famous musician 

It required marketing expertise, quickness and overall responsibility for each project.
profile_positions.title: Art Director/Graphic designer

volunteer_experiences.description:
Wall painting workshop with French and Senegalese girls in an elementary school in Senegal .

It was a pleasure teaching children who never held paint brush before .
in Collaboration with the French Association "échanges toubab".
The group is engaged in donation and education activities through the exchange of french children with children in Senegal.

Making a calendar for people to buy and thus get donations.
For this I made an impressive portrait of the Senegalese,
in combination with beautiful landscape photos,which Im sure many people will love.

Broodje Aap & Linke Soep is a catering service with a positive story: We want to be a meeting and matching place for 'old' and 'new' Tilburg and Brabant companies and organizations.
The end of 2016 we won the first prize in a nationwide ideas competition of the VSB fund. Meanwhile Broodje Aap & Linke Soep is known in Tilburg. Because of the good food and our cozy tasting room. 
Participation and re-integration of newcomers is in fact our purpose, the good food is our agent.
Knowing more? Check our website www.broodjeaaplinkesoep.nl and Facebook page.
